name: 2019/01/05 Salad Stop Make Your Own
description: Dive into a bowl of freshness with our '2019/01/05 Salad Stop Make Your Own' recipe, a delightful mix perfect for those who love low-sugar, high-fiber meals. This healthy recipe combines an assortment of greens and beans, promising a nutritious punch in every bite. Ideal for anyone following a health-conscious lifestyle!

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the spinach, cabbage, beet root, and broccoli under cold water until clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the lentils and beans in boiling water according to package instructions until tender, then drain. Estimated time: 20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the egg until hard-boiled, approximately 10 minutes, then cool, peel, and slice or chop.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the olives, beet root, and broccoli into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a large salad bowl, combine the spinach, shredded red cabbage, chopped olives, lentils, beans, beet root, broccoli, pomelo sections, and baby leaf rocket. Toss gently to mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Top the salad with sliced egg and serve fresh.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
